file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-25-05-04 - ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIATOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIATOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the zonal-attendant-call annunciator. B. The aircraft has four zonal-attendant-call annunciators. C. The zonal-attendant-call annunciators are installed in the passenger cabin, on the ceiling lining panels. D. Obey the safety precautions below, when you work on the switch of the zonal-attendant-call annunciator: • Disconnect the electrical power. • Always use insulated tools when you work on or near electrical circuits. E. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIA- ALL 33-25-05-000-801-A TOR - REMOVAL ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIA- ALL 33-25-05-400-801-A TOR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-25-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIATOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the zonal-attendant-call annunciator. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-30-00/100 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 243 243ALC Passenger cabin 243 243DLC Passenger cabin 253 253CLC Passenger cabin 263 263ALC Passenger cabin D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the LH Electrical Power Control/Distribution Box, open the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) On the RH Electrical Power Control/Distribution Box, open the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 and RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove headliner panels 243ALC, 243DLC, 253CLC, and 263ALC (AMM MPP 06-30-00/100). Refer to Standard Headliner Panel - Removal (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400, as applicable). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (2) Remove the clamp (2). (3) Remove the zonal attendant call annunciator (3) from the headliner. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Zonal-Attendant-Call Annunciator - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. CLAMP HEADLINER (REF.) 3. ZONAL-ATTENDANT- CALL ANNUNCIATOR DET. B (4 POSITIONS) (TYP.) 145AMM330114.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ZONAL-ATTENDANT-CALL ANNUNCIATOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the zonal-attendant-call annunciator. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-30-00/100 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400 - READING AND ATTENDANT CALL LIGHTS (1) - OP- AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 243 243ALC Passenger cabin 243 243DLC Passenger cabin 253 253CLC Passenger cabin 263 263ALC Passenger cabin D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the zonal-attendant-call annunciator (3) on the headliner. (2) Install the clamp (2). (3) Connect the electrical connector (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-25-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install headliner panels 243ALC, 243DLC, 253CLC, and 263ALC (AMM MPP 06-30-00/100). Refer to Standard Headliner Panel - Installation (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400, as applicable). (2) On the LH Electrical Power Control/Distribution Box, close the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (3) On the RH Electrical Power Control/Distribution Box, close the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 and RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. (4) Do an operational test on the Reading and Attendant Call Lights ( AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500).
